name: De Feet RPG
description:
This is the preliminary release of the overhauled De Feet game. Previously an episodic game, it will merge and overhaul the current three episodes and have new RPG systems in place.

This is just the first episode, so don't expect a lot at this time. So as it stands now, I'm offering it for a low initial price. You can wait for a bigger and better game later or jump in now and get free updates.

Premise: You play as Ricky, a 6 year old boy who finds a pair of magical shoes after bunking off his PE lesson. He soon finds the darker side of the shoes, as he and the other survivors investigate their origin and why they were chosen to use the shoes' powers...

Features:

-A  story with many possible endings.

-Gorgeous and realistic visuals.

-Every main character has their own distinct likes and dislikes. You can't please everybody, but that makes it all the more special.

-The new ability to fight the enemies without the need for sneaking around them.
